scripts.dev: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run dev --prefix backend
scripts.dev:both: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run dev:watch --prefix backend
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run preview --prefix frontend"
